Halo M41 Rocket launcher reticle + HUD
"Master Chief, mind telling me what you're doing in a WT sight?"

"Sir, veying the battlefield."

Update 1.1: Added some missing lines on the bottom right of the Rocket Launcher

Sup fellas!
This is yet another Halo-related usersight I've made for my 13th project. But I've decided to go above and beyond to draw the HUD of the original Halo CE HUD even with the appropriate and correct weapon too, being the iconic M41 Rocket Launcher. 😎

Two types of ballistics and one type of t...

Halo: †hunders of Nazareth

Yo fellas 😎
My 12th usersight (and quickest one made) is a crossover between the iconic Halo CE Scorpion tank crosshair and the album cover of † (Cross) by Justice.

Making crosshair reticles from other FPS shooter games really is an untapped market for WT usersight making.
Two variants of the sight can be found: One with ballistics and one without.

WTDraw files inside, you know the drill at this point.

Both sights are universal and can be used on any tank, though use the one with ballistic ra...
